name: Item Lists
semantic_context: Helper for working with lists of items and transforming arrays
natural_language_description: 这是 Item Lists 节点。主要用于: Helper for working with lists of items and transforming arrays

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: itemList

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: splitOutItems
available_options: Concatenate Items (值: aggregateItems) - Combine fields into a list in a single new item
Limit (值: limit) - Remove items if there are too many
Remove Duplicates (值: removeDuplicates) - Remove extra items that are similar
Sort (值: sort) - Change the item order
Split Out Items (值: splitOutItems) - Turn a list inside item(s) into separate items
Summarize (值: summarize) - Aggregate items together (pivot table)

fieldToSplitOut.name: fieldToSplitOut
fieldToSplitOut.description: The name of the input field to break out into separate items
fieldToSplitOut.natural_language_description: 参数名: Field To Split Out | 作用: The name of the input field to break out into separate items | (必填项)

include.name: include
include.natural_language_description: 参数名: Include | 默认值: allFields

fieldsToInclude.name: fieldsToInclude
fieldsToInclude.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields To Include | 默认值: {}

aggregate.name: aggregate
aggregate.natural_language_description: 参数名: Aggregate | 默认值: aggregateIndividualFields
available_options: All Item Data (Into a Single List) (值: aggregateAllItemData)

fieldsToAggregate.name: fieldsToAggregate
fieldsToAggregate.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields To Aggregate | 默认值: {'fieldToAggregate': [{'fieldToAggregate': '', 'renameField': False}]}

destinationFieldName.name: destinationFieldName
destinationFieldName.description: The name of the output field to put the data in
destinationFieldName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Put Output in Field | 作用: The name of the output field to put the data in | 默认值: data

fieldsToExclude.name: fieldsToExclude
fieldsToExclude.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields To Exclude | 默认值: {}

compare.name: compare
compare.description: The fields of the input items to compare to see if they are the same
compare.natural_language_description: 参数名: Compare | 作用: The fields of the input items to compare to see if they are the same | 默认值: allFields

fieldsToCompare.name: fieldsToCompare
fieldsToCompare.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields To Compare | 默认值: {}

type.name: type
type.description: The fields of the input items to compare to see if they are the same
type.natural_language_description: 参数名: Type | 作用: The fields of the input items to compare to see if they are the same | 默认值: simple

sortFieldsUi.name: sortFieldsUi
sortFieldsUi.description: The fields of the input items to compare to see if they are the same
sortFieldsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields To Sort By | 作用: The fields of the input items to compare to see if they are the same | 默认值: {}

code.name: code
code.description: Javascript code to determine the order of any two items

maxItems.name: maxItems
maxItems.description: If there are more items than this number, some are removed
maxItems.natural_language_description: 参数名: Max Items | 作用: If there are more items than this number, some are removed | 默认值: 1

keep.name: keep
keep.description: When removing items, whether to keep the ones at the start or the ending
keep.natural_language_description: 参数名: Keep | 作用: When removing items, whether to keep the ones at the start or the ending | 默认值: firstItems

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: disableDotNotation (值: None) - Whether to disallow referencing child fields using `parent.child` in the field name

fieldsToSummarize.name: fieldsToSummarize
fieldsToSummarize.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields to Summarize | 默认值: {'values': [{'aggregation': 'count', 'field': ''}]}

fieldsToSplitBy.name: fieldsToSplitBy
fieldsToSplitBy.description: The name of the input fields that you want to split the summary by
fieldsToSplitBy.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields to Group By | 作用: The name of the input fields that you want to split the summary by | 提示: Enter the name of the fields as text (separated by commas)
